Differentially Private Queries using Lap.description: Executes queries using the Laplace mechanism, ensuring privacy by adding noise to the results.
Differentially Private Queries using Lap.use_case: Useful in scenarios where continuous outcomes are needed while maintaining differential privacy.

Condition Value.description: The value based on which the anonymization condition is applied (for queries like count).

Epsilon.description: Privacy budget controlling the level of noise added to the results.

Query.description: The query to be executed on the data.
